TagCategory.name: TagCategory
TagCategory.description: Group similar interest tags together into tag categories.

Description.description: A detailed description of the tag category.

Icon.description: Icon to visually represent your tag category.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the tag category is still active (true) or has been dismissed (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Level.description: Create a hierarchy of levels of tag categories.

Name.description: The name of the tag category.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the tag category.

ParentCategoryId.description: The user, account, or contact associated with the tag category.
